mapper.sql: id, year, report_serial, state, report_path, customer_name, user_id, user_name, organization_id, organization_name, serial_date, capital_verification_type, original_value_of_assets, increase_capital, assess_capital, currency, report_properties, contact, tel, address, industry, unified_social_credit_code, company_type, report_date, remarks, first_audit_person_id, first_audit_person_name, first_audit_opinion, first_audit_date, second_audit_person_id, second_audit_person_name, second_audit_opinion, second_audit_date, third_audti_person_id, third_audit_person_name, third_audit_opinion, third_audit_date, payment_method, amount_received, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into capital_verification ( id, year, report_serial, state, report_path, customer_name, user_id, user_name, organization_id, organization_name, serial_date, capital_verification_type, original_value_of_assets, increase_capital, assess_capital, currency, report_properties, contact, tel, address, industry, unified_social_credit_code, company_type, report_date, remarks, first_audit_person_id, first_audit_person_name, first_audit_opinion, first_audit_date, second_audit_person_id, second_audit_person_name, second_audit_opinion, second_audit_date, third_audti_person_id, third_audit_person_name, third_audit_opinion, third_audit_date, payment_method, amount_received, is_deleted, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{id}, #{year}, #{reportSerial}, #{state}, #{reportPath}, #{customerName}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{organizationId}, #{organizationName}, #{serialDate}, #{capitalVerificationType}, #{originalValueOfAssets}, #{increaseCapital}, #{assessCapital}, #{currency}, #{reportProperties}, #{contact}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{industry}, #{unifiedSocialCreditCode}, #{companyType}, #{reportDate}, #{remarks}, #{firstAuditPersonId}, #{firstAuditPersonName}, #{firstAuditOpinion}, #{firstAuditDate}, #{secondAuditPersonId}, #{secondAuditPersonName}, #{secondAuditOpinion}, #{secondAuditDate}, #{thirdAudtiPersonId}, #{thirdAuditPersonName}, #{thirdAuditOpinion}, #{thirdAuditDate}, #{paymentMethod}, #{amountReceived}, #{isDeleted}, NOW(), NULL )
mapper.select:
select
from capital_verification where is_deleted = 0
AND report_serial like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND (user_id = #{userId} or first_audit_person_id = #{userId} or second_audit_person_id = #{userId} or third_audti_person_id = #{userId})
AND state = #{state}
AND date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
${params.dataScope}
